#ifndef  _GV_SCALE_
#define  _GV_SCALE_

#include <gvsfvec3f.h>
#include <gvsubnode.h>

class GvScale : public GvNode {

    GV_NODE_HEADER(GvScale);

  public:
    // Fields
    GvSFVec3f           scaleFactor;    // Scale factors in x, y, and z

        
        void Get(Matrix &m) {
               m = ScaleMatrix(scaleFactor);
        }

        // get matrix of node , FALSE if node has no matrix 
        GvBool getMatrix(Matrix &m);

        // multiply matrix with top matrix in current state
        int Do(GTraversal &state);   
        int Do(GOptimizeTraversal &state);      // implemented in GOptimizeTraversal.cpp


};

#endif /* _GV_SCALE_ */
